com.unibet.worktest.dao

Class TransactionDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport
        • com.unibet.worktest.dao.TransactionDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionDao, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class TransactionDaoImpl
extends org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport
implements TransactionDao
    Provides implementation of interface TransactionDao for data access operations on database tables transaction_history and transaction_leg
    Author:
    Moupiya
